channel.title: CVE Feed for thoughtbot -- paperclip ruby gem
channel.description: The latest CVEs for thoughtbot -- paperclip ruby gem

item.title: CVE-2017-0889|2024-08-05T13:18:06.454Z -- thoughtbot -- paperclip%20ruby%20gem
item.description: Paperclip ruby gem version 3.1.4 and later suffers from a Server-SIde Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in the Paperclip::UriAdapter class. Attackers may be able to access information about internal network resources.
